Name: Telepathy Zero
About the game: Use your psychic abilities to compete against other test subjects and prove your psychic powers! Try to predict the figure that will be shown on screen. Each correct answer in a row will add to your streak, increasing your score and proving your psychic abilities for all to see! This game uses steam leaderboard to compare scores with other players.
